isis.stitle: DT-466E and 530E Diesel Engine Service (1995 through 1999) - SECTION 12: HIGH PRESSURE LUBE OIL SYSTEM - SUPPLY MANIFOLD INSTALLATION - INSTALLING THE ICP SENSOR

svcprocinfo.para: Use one of the following procedures when installing the ICP Sensor.

svcsubproc.title: Engines Equipped With The Old Three-Way Fitting

step1.para: Apply Loctite(r) #277 to the threads of the ICP sensor.

Install the ICP sensor with a new O-Ring into the supply manifold elbow, located at the front of the supply manifold. Tighten to the special torque value ( Figure 12.43
).

figure.caption: Figure 12.41 Install Fuel Supply Line On Engines Equipped With Top Mounted Primer Pump
Figure 12.42 Install Fuel Supply Line On Engines Equipped With Engine Mounted ECM Unit
Figure 12.43 Install ICP Sensor Into Old Three-Way Fitting

svcsubproc.title: Engines Equipped With New Three-Way Fitting

step1.para: Apply Loctite(r) #277 to the threads of the ICP sensor.

Install the ICP sensor with a new O-Ring into the supply manifold elbow, located at the front of the supply manifold. Tighten to the special torque value ( Figure 12.44
).

svcsubproc.title: Engines Equipped With Engine Mounted ECM Unit

step1.para: Apply Loctite(r) #277 to the threads of the ICP sensor.

Install the ICP sensor with a new O-Ring into center of the supply manifold elbow, located at the front of the supply manifold. Tighten to the special torque value ( Figure 12.45
).
